 3\. üèõÔ∏è PROJECT BLUEPRINT & SCHEMA (‡∏û‡∏¥‡∏°‡∏û‡πå‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏õ‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏£‡∏°)

‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏á‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Super-App ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á:

 3.1. Core Technology Stack

   Backend: Python (FastAPI)
   Frontend: Next.js (Web), React Native (Mobile)
   Game Engine: Unity
   Database: PostgreSQL (Primary), Redis (Cache)
   Blockchain: EVM Chains (Ethereum, Polygon, BSC)
   DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Terraform
   Core Principle: Multi-Platform, Multi-Language (i18n)

 3.2. Pillar 1: Financial Core (DeFi & Web3)

   Wallet:
       Non-custodial wallet creation (BIP39) & import.
       Metamask Integration: intergeade metamask (Web & React Native).
   Trader & Swap:
       DEX Aggregator (1inch/0x API) integration.
       "Trader" view (TradingView charts).
   Stake:
       Staking contracts (Solidity) for $ZEA.
       Frontend/Backend management.
   TOKENOMICS:
       ZeaToken ($ZEA): Governance, Utility, Staking.
       ZeaZToken ($ZEAZ): In-Game Currency.
       TOKENOMICS.md: Full documentation (Allocation, Vesting, Utility).
   Airdrop:
       Smart Contract (Merkle Tree) for efficient airdrops.
       Claim interface.

 3.3. Pillar 2: FinTech Bridge (Real World)

   Buy & Sell (On/Off-Ramp):
       Intergrade Real Bank Thai: API integration (PromptPay, QR Code) for THB deposits/withdrawals.
   Real Card:
       Architecture for Visa/Mastercard integration (via third-party provider) to spend crypto.

 3.4. Pillar 3: GameFi & Metaverse

   Unity Game:
       Game Slots Accept Crypto: Unity C scripts for a slot machine game.
       Uses $ZEAZ for betting and payouts.
   Web3 Integration:
       Connect Unity to MetaMask/WalletConnect (ChainSafe SDK) to verify $ZEAZ balance.
   MiniApp:
       Architecture to support "MiniApps" within the Super-App (similar to World App).

 3.5. Pillar 4: Identity & Community

   World ID ZKP Verification:
       Implement World ID (IDKit/JS) for Sybil resistance.
       Backend verification of claim(proof, nullifierHash).
       Use ZKP for privacy-preserving verification.
   Referral:
       On-chain and off-chain referral tracking system.
   Daily Check-in:
       Gamified daily login system to reward users (e.g., with $ZEAZ).

 3.6. Pillar 5: DevOps & Project Core

   GitHub:
       Define the Monorepo structure.
   Automate Installer:
       Full OS Req Automate Installer: A setup.sh (Bash) script for setting up the entire development environment (OS dependencies, Python, Node, Docker, etc.) on Ubuntu 22.04.
   Documentation (all Documentation .md):
       ARCHITECTURE.md (This blueprint).
       ROADMAP.md (Q1-Q4 roadmap).
       API.md (OpenAPI specs).
       CONTRIBUTING.md.

  

 4\. üöÄ OPERATIONAL PROTOCOL (‡∏•‡∏≥‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡∏±‡πà‡∏á‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô)

   User Command: "OMEGA: Generate 'Automate Installer' (setup.sh) for Full OS Req."

 Phase 2: Smart Contracts & Backend Core

   User Command: "OMEGA: Generate full source code (Solidity) for '$ZEA' and '$ZEAZ' Tokens."
   User Command: "OMEGA: Generate full source code (Solidity) for the 'Stake' contract."
   User Command: "OMEGA: Generate full Backend (Python/FastAPI) for 'World ID ZKP Verification' including the 'claim' endpoint."
   User Command: "OMEGA: Generate full Backend (Python/FastAPI) for 'Wallet' and 'Metamask Integration' logic."

 Phase 3: Frontend & Game Integration

   User Command: "OMEGA: Generate full Unity C scripts for 'Game Slots' using '$ZEAZ'."
